project1.title: Create Beauty
project1.description: Have you ever completed a makeup look and you received so many compliments that you wanted to cherish it forever? Well welcome to Create Beauty, the beauty application that allows you to store your look creation, rate them, and share them with others!
project1.technologies: React, Firebase, HTML, CSS, Javascript, & Bootstrap

project2.title: Sandwich Maker
project2.description: Hit the Spot is an application that will allow users to order a sandwich of their choice.

project3.title: Fadterest
project3.description: Pinterest aka Fadterest is a single page application that allows users to log in, create fad boards, and add pins all of your favorite fads to their boards.

project4.title: Solar System
project4.description: Solar System is a single page app that allow users to receive more information about the planets in our solar system.

project5.title: Pardon Us Band Website
project5.description: Pardon Us is group project I completed for a band called Pardon Us. I completed the about page.
